SEARCH
Package org.red5.server

Class MappingStrategy

java.lang.Object
org.red5.server.MappingStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMappingStrategy
public class MappingStrategy extends Object implements IMappingStrategy
Basic mapping strategy implementation. This one uses slash as filesystem path separator, '.service' postfix for services naming, '.handler' for handlers naming and 'default' string as default application name.
Author:
mondain

    • mapResourcePrefix

      public String mapResourcePrefix(String path)
      Map a context path to a path prefix for resources. Resolves resource prefix from path. Default application used as root when path is specified.
      Specified by:
      mapResourcePrefix in interface IMappingStrategy
      Parameters:
      path - context path to map
      Returns:
      The path prefix for resources with the given name

    • mapScopeHandlerName

      public String mapScopeHandlerName(String path)
      Map a context path to the name of a scope handler. Resolves scope handler name for path. Default application used as root when path is specified.
      Specified by:
      mapScopeHandlerName in interface IMappingStrategy
      Parameters:
      path - context path to map
      Returns:
      The name of a scope handler

    • mapServiceName

      public String mapServiceName(String name)
      Map a name to the name of a service. Resolves service filename name from name
      Specified by:
      mapServiceName in interface IMappingStrategy
      Parameters:
      name - name to map
      Returns:
      The name of the service with the passed name
